column4: Anybody know of a decent ircd for ubuntu that I can configure to only accept connections from localhost?
Why does my computer stop responding when I remove the keyboard?
ie: it can't be pinged when the keyboard comes out
Yeah, I have 4 servers like this sitting here... 1 working keyboard.
and now, even with a kvm switch... switching from one computer to the other with the scroll lock X2, up key combo freezes BOTH machines
